nodemanager.files

Class AbstractWayfindingFileHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • nodemanager.files.AbstractWayfindingFileHelper
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    MapFileHelper, NodeConnFileHelper, NodeCoordFileHelper, NodeLabelFileHelper, VersionLog, WayfindingManifest

    public abstract class AbstractWayfindingFileHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    The AbstractWayfindingFileHelper class is used to serve as the base for helping read and write the various data files created by the program, and used by the Wayfinding program. Subclasses must include the proper fields to contain their appropriate data, as this class contains mostly just methods for creating files, with abstract methods for reading from and writing to files.

    • Constructor Detail

      • AbstractWayfindingFileHelper

        public AbstractWayfindingFileHelper(java.lang.String title,
                                    FileType t)
        Creates an AbstracteWayfindingFile. Note that this does not actually create any files on the user's hard drive yet.
        Parameters:
        title - what to call this file when it is saved or uploaded to the drive
        t - what type of file this will connect to. Used to get file extention and MIME type.
